name: Flower Project
description:
This is a story about friendship, kindness, and fighting god.

Summary 

There once was a garden where bees and flowers lived happily, but when strange things start to happen, Bee-kun and Flower-kun must save their home. However, many obstacles get in their way. The garden with its dark secrets may not be worth saving after all….     

Features

  • A deep and meaningful plot
  • 3 main endings (1 bad, 1 normal, 1 good)
  • 1 hour+ of gameplay
  • Over 10 CGs
  • Many characters to meet
  • Important Sidequests
  • Bees as the main character
  • An amazing adventure

Bzzt.... to get the secret ending, you must learn the history of the bees....
